net.myerichsen.hremvp

Class HreH2ConnectionPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myerichsen.hremvp.HreH2ConnectionPool

  • public class HreH2ConnectionPool
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class that instantiates a JDBC Connection Pool and returns a connection to it
    Version:
    21. apr. 2019
    Author:
    Michael Erichsen, © History Research Environment Ltd., 2018-2019
